on top of that, during invocation, the prime minister's position was legally guaranteed, even if a no-confidence motion was passed in the diet.

normalized: a user of the cicada shell technique?!
alias, “mind transference”.
it was an unusual ninja art that controlled others' bodies by transferring one's own mind into them.
one could say it was a ninja art that stole another person's body, and changed it into one's own, even including one's appearance.
that aspect differed from possession ninja arts that merely manipulated another person's body by possessing it.
asagi was also aware of this, but it was her first time meeting with a cicada shell user in practice.
at this time, there weren't any users of it in the village.
it was that rare a ninja art.

name: woman
normalized: w, where is this?
why am i… hiih!
the woman who had regained her body, which had been dispossessed by mind transference, looked at asagi, who was holding a sword, and raised a stiff voice.
her tone of voice and body movement were, no matter how you looked at them, those of a normal woman.

name: woman
normalized: wh, who the hell are you?
eh?
the frightened woman had come across the chief cabinet secretary's body.
her face twisted in horror.

name: woman
normalized: kyaah!
she raised an ear-piercing shriek.

name: asagi
normalized: sorry.
her making a racket would be a problem.
asagi made the woman, who didn't understand anything, faint from a knockout blow.
this woman had had her body manipulated by that masked taimanin.
no matter what was asked, she probably wouldn't answer.

name: asagi
normalized: that masked woman, who the hell was she?
enemy or ally?
still, she felt like she had met her somewhere.
it might be her imagination, but…
also, there were too many things about asuka and asai that she didn't know.
were they both pawns of nomad?
no, apart from asai, was that really so for asuka?

name: asagi
normalized: asuka, if you are, i――
asagi swallowed her next words.
